Hi. My name is Alex Polywka. My pronouns are he/him. I am a software developer with a preference for low-level development such as embedded sytems and operating systems. I grew up in a low-income, single-parent household and unfortunately ended up dropping out of high school due to mental health issues. I moved to Washington state at the age of 17 and after some time spent there I decided I wanted to make a major change in the direction of my life and completed my GED with honors in every category. With that momentum, I attended Olympic College in Bremerton, WA where I achieved a GPA over 3.8 which was enough for me to transfer into the University of Washingtonâ€™s Paul G. Allen school in Seattle where I completed my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
